name: Cube Mover
description:
Small puzzle game made in a 7 days Game Jam hosted by Brackeys.

The goal is to get one of the cubes to the blue flag with the help of the other cubes by climbing on them, lower cube values cannot climb on higher cubes values.

Use the ‘E’ or ‘Q’ keys to select a cube and move the selected cube using the arrows or the ‘WASD’ keys.
